name: todolist
description: A simple Todolist Webpage in which you can add, delete tasks in your todolist easily. You can also create custom todolist's like Work, Learning etc by simply appending a forward slash '/' and the name of your custom list in the URL e.g https://protected-earth-00038.herokuapp.com/Work . The webpage also connected to the Mongodb database. You can checkout deployment of the same here : https://protected-earth-00038.herokuapp.com/
